title: owlcatz
author: owlcatz
created_time: June 02, 2022, 02:38:21 PMLast edit: June 05, 2022, 07:24:33 PM by owlcatz
content: Three day auction!8 x Bitcoin Penny 2-packs from 2016-2020, 4 x 2 coin packs of 2015-2018, 4 x 1 packs of 2018-2020, plus a 3-pack of “Invisible Bitcoin Pennies” made from acrylic. All are in original packaging, unopened. I believe there is one of each for each year ever made, but I may have missed one or possibly a year maybe? @bitcoinpenny / Chris / MJ - … amirite?  Anyhow, The following lot is up for auction: (Click for bigger):Includes 1 Silver Doodle, and 2 stickers:1 x 2015 "CJB" 2-coin pack (Cu)1 x 2016 "DAVE" 2-coin pack (Cu)1 x 2017 "IRIE" 2-coin pack (Cu)1 x 2018 "JULIE" 2-coin pack (Cu)1 x 2018 "MC" 1-coin pack (Cu)1 x 2019 "AMD" 1-coin pack (Cu)1 x 2020 "MGHB" 1-coin pack (Cu) (Normal one)1 x 2020 "MGHB" 1-coin pack (Cu)(DIY Edition)1 x 2018 "HGW"(?) 3-coin pack (Acrylic) (Invisible edition)2 Bitcoin Penny Stickers1 Silver Edition Doodle (As pictured)Starting bid:0.0 BTCMinimum bid increments per lot: 0.0005 BTCEnd time : SUNDAY, JUNE 5 2022, 4:00PM EST (NEW YORK USA TIME) - Countdown Timer HERE!EDIT - Here is the current time in NYC USA for reference, in case this new countdown timer is garbage... :https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/usa/new-yorkSniping (Clarity Added) : Bids within the final 10 minutes before the auction end extend the auction for EXACTLY 10  minutes since the last bid! To be clear as possible: EACH consecutive bid PER LOT thereafter is valid UNTIL 10 minutes have passed since the LAST valid bid per lot. Example: If you bid 3 mins before auction end, auction end is EXACTLY 10 mins since your last post’s TIMESTAMP, unless another bid is received within 10 minutes of yours. This continues UNTIL NO VALID bid has been posted for 10 minutes! (Just to be clear since this can be interpreted in different ways)!  Shipping : USPS First Class, domestic and international available. UPS avail as well, but prefer USPS, thanks. Payment: BTC Escrow? Sure…  with MoparMiningLLC, or your choice! Winner pays fees etcThanks!Edit - See my signature for any info about transacting with me, and about securing your forum account for buying and selling safely here, Thank you! Questions, shoot me a pm.  Edited - Added link to current date/time in NYC USA for reference.  Fixed errors in my post, added full list of items. (Still need ref links sorry)

comments.body: 0.0025 BTCDoes the lot include 4 x "Bitcoin Penny" 2-packs & 4 x "Bitcoin Penny" 1 penny pack? (ie. the exact items that are displayed in the pictures)Just a clarification question, since the item description says  "8 x Bitcoin Penny 2-packs from 2016-2020".Thanks
